attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that if you got rid of all pub car parks it would reduce the number of drink drivers.They wouldnt be able to park near the pubs niether as most of them have yellow lines around the streets.which means if the general public spot some one staggering to a car they can quickly be stopped very quickly and resulting in saving innocent lives to these people.
